com.io7m.jpra.runtime.java

Class JPRAStringCursorByteBuffered

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.jpra.runtime.java.JPRAStringCursorByteBuffered
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JPRAStringCursorReadableType, JPRAStringCursorType, JPRAStringCursorWritableType

    public final class JPRAStringCursorByteBuffered
extends Object
implements JPRAStringCursorType
    An implementation of the JPRAStringCursorType that accesses an underlying ByteBuffer.
